Package org.xmlcml.cml.converters.cif Description

Converts CIF files to CML

Normally this is a 2- or even 3-pass system:
  • convert CIF to CIFXML
  • convert CIFXML to "raw" CML
  • convert raw CML to CompleteCML
Includes a number of support tools.
